net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_assertVersion
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Asserts the current AE2 action object is a compatible version. arg(0) = (Optional) If true (1), report the assertion and abort. If false (default), do not report or abort but return the result.
Returns true(1) or false(0), unless assertion ends execution immediately
